document_name: Ministry Unveils New Waste Strategy that is Both Environmental and Economic
document_description: The objective of this document is to enable make the waste sector more sustainable by 2030 and enable a circular economy by 2050. The strategy addresses treatment of Municipal Solid Waste (MSW) in a comprehensive manner and includes the following key abatement measures in relation to sources of GHG emissions.•        Transition from 80% of waste landfilling in 2020, to only 20% by 2030; •        Zero landfilling of untreated organic waste and paper and cardboard by 2030;•        All active landfills will be sealed, and methane collection and destruction/utilization systems will be installed, so that methane collection will amount to no less than 50% of total methane production in the landfill.
